flavor_text.sword-shield: The user handles a sharp leaf like a sword and attacks by cutting its target. Critical hits land more easily.
flavor_text.legends-arceus: The user handles a sharp leaf like a sword and attacks by cutting its target. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.
